Class ParameterNameValueDefaultRequired

  affymetrix.calvin.parameter.ParameterNameValue

public class ParameterNameValueDefaultRequired
extends ParameterNameValue

A class to hold a name/value/type/default/required attributes.

MIMEructor. Useful when reading in from a file

Parameters:
n - Parameter name
mimeValue - MIME encoded value
mimeType - The MIME type.
defaultMimeValue - The default MIME encoded value in a buffer.
req - Flag to indicate if the parameter is required.
